item.title: Level up your Azure Platform as a Service applications with Pulumi
item.description: Pulumi enables developers to define cloud infrastructure using general purpose programming languages. Pulumi works with multiple cloud providers and has first-class support for all services in Microsoft Azure.

item.title: Programmable Cloud: Provisioning Azure App Service with Pulumi
item.description: Modern Cloud providers offer a wide variety of services of different types and levels. A modern cloud application would leverage multiple services in order to be efficient in terms of developer experience, price, operations etc.

item.title: Custom Autoscaling with Durable Functions
item.description: In my previous post Custom Autoscaling of Azure App Service with a Function App I’ve created a Function App which watches a Service Bus Subscription backlog and adjusts the scale of App Service based on the observed load.

item.title: Custom Autoscaling of Azure App Service with a Function App
item.description: The power of cloud computing comes from its elasticity and ability to adapt to changing load. Most Azure services can be scaled up or down manually: by human interaction in the portal, or by running a command or a script.
